ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: Since when has Verant ever been worried about balancing classes in respect to others? If they were then necros would get a serious nerf.  I would think class
ygData.messageBody:
Since when has Verant ever been worried about balancing classes in respect
to others? If they were then necros would get a serious nerf. I would think
class specific items only need to be balanced for the class they are
designed for.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 10:50 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces


At 10:31 AM 6/13/00 -1000, you wrote:
>Thats the entire point behind the original poster's idea. IMO, its
>completely justifiable based on the time and effort required to obtain the
>armor.
>
>Galtin of E'ci

it can't just be justifiable based on time and effort, it must also be
balanced
with respect to other classes. for example, you can't create a 2 damage
1 delay sword that is bard only usable, then say oh it's balanced because
it takes 1000 hours to get it. the time/difficulty it takes to get it is
only part
of the equation.
